name: DracinMorte
blurb: 3rd/1st Person RPG: The Necro-King Thanatos is removed from his throne in the underworld and has to regain it through powerful means.

rewards.reward: No Reward

Floating Soul Tier\r\n*************************************************\r\nWe thank you for your support! You get access to the forums as well as a badge that represents your donation. Access to the forums means that you can come vote on content for the game.  We look forward to seeing you there!

Wandering Spirit Tier\r\n************************************************* Get a digital wallpaper pack of 5 pieces as well as the "Making of DracinMorte" video. You will also get a badge to reflect your donation on the forum.  (+ Previous Tiers).

EARLY Trickster Tier\r\n*************************************************\r\nGet a digital copy of the game, as well as the game manual, AND in game Kickstarter Potion with special properties as well. On top of that get a special badge to reflect your donations in the forum.   (+ Previous Tiers).

Trickster Tier\r\n*************************************************\r\nGet a digital copy of the game, as well as the game manual, AND and in game Kickstarter Potion with special properties as well. On top of that get a special badge to reflect your donations in the forum.   (+ Previous Tiers).

Imp Tier
*************************************************
Get an in game bone dragon pet to follow you around on your adventures! This tier also includes a digital version of the art book and a forum badge reflecting your donation.
  (+ Previous Tiers).

EARLY Goblin Tier
*************************************************
Receive Alpha access to the game getting each module after we finish it, as well as the ability to leave us feedback to make changes based on your experiences.  Need More?  A digital game guide will also be included in this tier to take you one step further into the game world.  Be sure to equip your badge in the forums to show how much you donated!
  (+ Previous Tiers).

Goblin Tier *************************************************\r\nReceive Alpha access to the game getting each module after we finish it, as well as the ability to leave us feedback to make changes based on your experiences.  Need More?  A digital game guide will also be included in this tier to take you one step further into the game world.  Be sure to equip your badge in the forums to show how much you donated!\r\n  (+ Previous Tiers).

Cerberus Tier *************************************************\r\nGet a Kickstarter exclusive mount to ride on in-game, as well as a digital Creature Guide to study up on the in-game creatures and their stats.  The creature guide will include all monsters in the game including rare ones with art and descriptions, as well as a checklist!  You also get a forum badge to represent how much you donated.\r\n  (+ Previous Tiers).

EARLY Ghoul Tier
*************************************************
Get a physical copy of the game, a DracinMorte T-Shirt, a physical game manual, a thank you postcard from the team, and some stickers just for fun! You also get a forum badge to represent your donation.
  (+ Previous Tiers).

Ghoul Tier *************************************************\r\nGet a physical copy of the game, a DracinMorte T-Shirt, a physical game manual, a thank you postcard from the team, and some stickers just for fun! You also get a forum badge to represent your donation.\r\n  (+ Previous Tiers).

Sprite Tier *************************************************\r\nHere you will get to pick from one of the four plushies (King Thanatos, Ays, skeletal dragon, or imp) as well as get a printed poster from DracinMorte signed by the artist. You will also get a forum badge representing your donation.\r\n  (+ Previous Tiers).

Black Crow Tier
*************************************************
Get a custom made DracinMorte limited edition bronze coin as well as an in-game Crafter's "Jumpstart" pack which will give you a head-start on your crafting supplies in game.  Also you'll get a forum badge that reflects your donation.
  (+ Previous Tiers).

EARLY Minotaur Tier *************************************************\r\nHere you will get a collector's edition of the game with special packaging, as well as a cloth map of the world, a DracinMorte mousepad, a physical printed gameguide, the physical "Making of DracinMorte" video, a limited edition in game Kickstarter exclusive item, and a Collector's Edition Mount!  This tier also gets a forum badge to represent your donation to the game.\r\n  (+ Previous Tiers).

Minotaur Tier *************************************************\r\nHere you will get a collector's edition of the game with special packaging, as well as a cloth map of the world, a DracinMorte mousepad, a physical printed gameguide, the physical "Making of DracinMorte" video, a limited edition in game Kickstarter exclusive item, and a Collector's Edition Mount!  This tier also gets a forum badge to represent your donation to the game.\r\n  (+ Previous Tiers).

Doppleganger Tier *************************************************\r\nHere you get the Minotaur Tier as well as yourself as a character.  You'll send us a front and side photo of your face and you'll be turned into an NPC in the game. You'll also get a forum badge to represent the donation you have made and your name in the credits as a Backer Designer.

Mimic Tier *************************************************\r\nHere you get the Minotaur Tier as well as yourself drawn by our artists as a King of one of the in-game factions of your choice. You'll also get a forum badge to represent the donation you have made and your name in the credits as an Exclusive Backer. (This is just a digital painting of you as a king, and does not mean you will be a king in the game.)

Serpent Tier *************************************************\r\nHere you get the Minotaur Tier as well as the chance to design a set of armor with our artist.  She will collaborate with you to make your armor come to life in the game. You'll also get a forum badge to represent the donation you have made and your name in the credits as a Backer Designer. (Artist will have final say on the design to make sure it fits the cohesion of the world).

Orc Tier\r\n *************************************************\r\nHere you get the Minotaur Tier as well as the chance to design a cool weapon with our artist.  She will collaborate with you to make your weapon come to life in the game. You'll also get a forum badge to represent the donation you have made and your name in the credits as a Backer Designer. (Artist will have final say on the design to make sure it fits the cohesion of the world).

Zombie Tier *************************************************\r\nHere you get the Minotaur Tier as well as the chance to design an NPC with our artist.  She will collaborate with you to make your concept come to life in the game. You'll also get a forum badge to represent the donation you have made and your name in the credits as a Backer Designer. (Artist will have final say on the design to make sure it fits the cohesion of the world).

Vampire Tier *************************************************\r\nHere you get the Minotaur Tier as well as the chance to design an enemy unit with our artist.  She will collaborate with you to make your concept come to life in the game. You'll also get a forum badge to represent the donation you have made and your name in the credits as a Backer Designer. (Artist will have final say on the design to make sure it fits the cohesion of the world).

Gorgon Tier *************************************************\r\nHere you get the Minotaur Tier as well as the chance to design a grand building with our artist.  She will collaborate with you to make your building come to life in the game. Your building will then be intertwined into the story in a meaningful way whether it is a hut or a grand castle.  You'll also get a forum badge to represent the donation you have made and your name in the credits as a Backer Designer. (Artist will have final say on the design to make sure it fits the cohesion of the world).

Manticore Tier *************************************************\r\nHere you get the Minotaur Tier as well as the chance to design a mount with our artist.  She will collaborate with you to make your mount come to life in the game. You'll also get a forum badge to represent the donation you have made and your name in the credits as a Backer Designer. (Artist will have final say on the design to make sure it fits the cohesion of the world).

Fates Tier *************************************************\r\nHere you get the Minotaur Tier as well as a hand painted oil painting of a scene in the game done by our artist on canvas. You'll also get a forum badge to represent the donation you have made and your name in the credits as an Executive Backer.

Griffon Tier *************************************************\r\nHere you get the Minotaur Tier as well as the chance to design a short questline with a miniboss with our artist.  She will collaborate with you to make your idea come to life in the game. You'll also get a forum badge to represent the donation you have made and your name in the credits as a Backer Designer. (Artist will have final say on the design to make sure it fits the cohesion of the world).

Devil Tier\r\n *************************************************\r\nHere you get the Minotaur Tier as well as the chance to become a Lord of one of the factions.  Lords work for the king but are wealthy and powerful.  They have their own crests and coloring.  Teaming with our artist, she will help you design a crest, pick a color, a twist on the building styles of that faction, and make your likeness the lord of that very complex! You'll also get a forum badge to represent the donation you have made and your name in the credits as a Backer Designer. (Artist will have final say on the design to make sure it fits the cohesion of the world).

Psiren Tier *************************************************\r\nHere you get the Minotaur Tier as well as the opportunity to spend time with us online.  You will get a few hours with our programmer and artist to ask them questions, have the critique works, watch them work, or just chit chat.  You'll also get a forum badge to represent the donation you have made and your name in the credits as an Executive Backer.

Werewolf Tier *************************************************\r\nHere you get the Minotaur Tier as well as the opportunity to spend time with us at the four-day fantasy convention, DragonCon, in Atlanta.  We don't have a booth or panels, we just go for fun, and we'd like to have you along for the fun too!  We'll buy your ticket and food, and you can run around with us asking questions and having fun, or wander off by yourself.  You'll also get a forum badge to represent the donation you have made and your name in the credits as an Executive Backer.  //Lodging and Travel Expenses not included//

Beholder Tier *************************************************\r\nHere you get the Minotaur Tier as well as the opportunity to come hang out with us in person for a weekend or just a day. We'll buy you dinner and answer what questions you have about the game or game making.   You'll also get a forum badge to represent the donation you have made and your name in the credits as an Executive Backer.  //Lodging and Travel Expenses not included//

Hydra Tier *************************************************\r\nHere you get the Minotaur Tier as well as an invite to the Launch party as a Guest of Honor for donating so much.  There you will get to mingle with us, ask whatever questions you may like about the game or game-making and get a token of our appreciation at the party.  You'll also get a forum badge to represent the donation you have made and your name in the credits as a High Executive Backer.

Dragon Tier *************************************************\r\nYou're just pretty amazing. Here you get the Minotaur Tier as well as the opportunity to become a prominent side character in the game.  You could be the leader of the thieves guild that shows up to sell black market items in the game, or a dark enchanter that pops in cursing the King, or any number of things.  Our artist will collaborate with you to find out a story element that fits your desire and our storyline since your character will show up quite often and be involved in the story somehow. You'll also get a forum badge to represent the donation you have made and your name in the credits as a Grand Executive Backer.
